sentence: Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich argued that Biden’s strategy is “an unprecedented legal maneuver.” Because Biden dismissed the remaining legal challenges to the public charge rule, Arizona argues that states that supported the rule were left with no recourse.
author: Jordan Dixon-Hamilton
title: Supreme Court Hears Arguments Over ‘Public Charge’ Rule

sentence: “This is a tremendous victory for the rule of law and the safety of our communities,” Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich said in a press release Tuesday.
title: Kamala Harris out as border czar?! This lawsuit says…

sentence: Arizona attorney general Mark Brnovich has launched an antitrust investigation into this collusion.
author: Michael G. Zey
title: What Happens When a GOP Majority Can Investigate the Jan. 6 Committee?
